story_24_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: I feel wonderful...like my heart is melting.
story_24_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: Your shine—it greatly exceeded my expectations.
story_24_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: I don’t feel the pain of losing... I just feel moved.
story_24_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Oh Rattata! I thought this plan would work
for sure!
story_24_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
We’re not gonna quit! Next time, we’ll really
wreck the PML!
story_24_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
There’s nothing to be worried about. If they try
anything funny, we’ll give them the boot!
story_24_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Doesn’t matter if a sync pair didn’t make it to the
PML or if they lost along the way. They all have
the one thing they need: the flame of courage!
story_24_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: Hah! We’ll protect everyone in the PML!
story_24_04000/2401_1001_1100_10: I couldn’t even make it this far...
story_24_04000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Fight with all my might, and achieve a
shining victory...
story_24_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
That was my plan. But there were some
unexpected surprises, so my strategy had
to change.
story_24_04000/2401_0402_1700_10: No, not them. Two wonderfully shining things.
story_24_04000/2401_1001_1800_10:
One of them was you, of course. You shine
so bright...
story_24_04000/2401_1001_2000_10:
everyone’s dazzlingly bright courage,
which astounded even me!
story_24_04000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Make sure your heart shines brighter and brighter
every day!
